name: Devrim Yakut
summary: Devrim Yakut. Actress: Camdaki Kiz. Devrim Yakut is a Turkish actress(Theatre, Tv series, Movies)and Acting Coach. She was born in Ankara in 27th May 1968. She was graduated from DTCF; Theatre Department of Ankara University in 1992. She first had her education of theatre hypothesis at DTCF Theatre Department and then acting education. She attended to the staff of Adana State Theatre in 1994 and she continued her duty there...
